title: Strengthening Software Development Practical Competencies: Text Signal Utilization Strategies for Understanding Scientific Explanatory Texts

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can identify key subtopics (SIS) in scientific explanatory texts with 80% accuracy and represent them as visual maps.
Learners can improve global inference skills by 20% using text signals (underlining, emphasis).
Learners can write project reports on scientific topics based on text structure analysis.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
